title: Virus Elements
longDescription:
Enjoy the dynamic and action animation template, which includes a unique collection of virus elements! This package contains 20 Virus sprite sheet animations for 2D Games.

         

Features:

● Sprite animations work much better than any other shaders and particles due to

memory capacity.

● Optimized for games.

● Pivot point set properly.

● No setup or plug-ins required.

● All materials, sprites and other parts of pack properly named.
technicalDetails:
Video:

https://youtu.be/Zant4At4_Fw


Technical details:

● File Formats: transparent Png.

● Each frame dimension is 512*288 px.

● 15 FPS


Texture Resolutions:


● Distance_#[512,288].png 2560x1728

● Doctor_#[512,288].png 2048x1152

● Fever_#[512,288].png 2048x1440

● Handshakes_#[512,288].png 4608x3168

● Home_#[512,288].png 2560x1728

● Mask 01_#[512,288].png 2560x1728

● Mask 02_#[512,288].png 2560x2016

● People_#[512,288].png 2560x2016

● Prohibited 01_#[512,288].png 1024x1152

● Prohibited 02_#[512,288].png 2560x1728

● Sickness_#[512,288].png 2048x1440

● Sneez 01_#[512,288].png 2048x1728

● Sneez 02_#[512,288].png 2048x1728

● Travel 01_#[512,288].png 2048x1440

● Travel 02_#[512,288].png 2048x1440
